structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 265, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 400, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 150, effective January 2, 1978; and ch. 17, sec. 37, effective January 1, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4151-3, 4151-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Sheriff to record delinquent tax collections -- Penalty for failure to record or collect -- Prosecution by county attorney -- Compensation.
